title: Richly Appointed Loft Apartments Just 2 Miles West of Downtown
posting_body: Lofts elevate urban living to a new level of luxury.
Four majestic stories conceal richly appointed loft apartments just two miles west of downtown Houston.
Prices & Specials change daily, contact me for availability

Best Value Near Downtown w/Sweeping Skyline Views, 21 Unique 1&2 Bedroom Apt Homes w/Dramatic 10' Ceilings, Resort-style pool w/Sundeck, Heated Spa & WiFi, Reflection Pond, Meditation Garden, Private Courtyards, Multiple Outdoor Lounging and Entertainment Areas, Oversized Patios and Balconies, Stained Concrete in Ground Floor Lofts & Wood  Floors in Upper Floor Lofts, Epicurean Kitchen w/Black-on-Black Appliances, Granite Countertops, Kitchen Islands w/Pendant Lights, Luxurious Baths w/Oversized Tubs, Large Closets, Cultured Marble Countertops, Spacious Dressing Room

Pool, Assigned parking, Fitness center, Movie library, Door to door trash pickup, Perimeter fence, Picnic area, Dry cleaning service, Club house, 2 Hot Tubs, Gated entrance, Game/Sport room, Business center, Outdoor Grills, Community parking garage, Elevators, Free WiFi Areas

Non-carpeted flooring, Self-cleaning ovens, Miniblinds, Premium Countertops, Custom built-ins, Garden/large tubs, Ceiling fans, Private patios/balconies, Intrusion alarms, Dishwashers,  Walk-in showers, Storage closet outside, Microwaves, Cable ready, Ice makers, Custom carpet, W/D machines, Hi-speed internet, Walk-in closets, Garbage disposals
